LanguageData.VFEA_VaultWall.label: стіна сховища
LanguageData.VFEA_VaultWall.description: A thick, triple-reinforced steel wall. Nearly indestructible.
LanguageData.VFEA_VaultDoor.label: двері сховища
LanguageData.VFEA_VaultDoor.description: A thick vault auto-door, which takes a very long time to open and close, but is nearly indestructible. If the power is cut, it will remain locked.
